method.name: enumerateDevices
method.tp:docstring: Retreive a printable list of all the video capture devices that are available.

arg.name: list
arg.tp:docstring: The list of all the video capture devices that are available.

method.name: getResolutionForDevice
method.tp:docstring: Find out what resolutions are supported for this device.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The video device.

arg.name: list
arg.tp:docstring: The list of supported resolutions. First field is width, the other is height.

method.name: getFrameRates
method.tp:docstring: Find out what framerates are supported for a device under some resolution.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The video device.

arg.name: width
arg.tp:docstring: The frame width.

arg.name: height
arg.tp:docstring: The frame height.

arg.name: list
arg.tp:docstring: The list of supported framerates.

method.name: startLocalCapture
method.tp:docstring: Start capturing frames from a specified video device and write to shared memory.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The video device to start capturing from.

arg.name: width
arg.tp:docstring: The source width.

arg.name: height
arg.tp:docstring: The source height.

arg.name: fps
arg.tp:docstring: The preferred frame rate, expressed as a ratio.

arg.name: path
arg.tp:docstring: A path to the shared memory segment, followed by a token for referring to this request when calling stop.

method.name: stopLocalCapture
method.tp:docstring: Stop capturing video. This method merely declares to the daemon that the client won't need access to the shared memory segment anymore.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The video device to stop capturing from.

arg.name: token
arg.tp:docstring: The token that was obtained when startLocalCapture() was called.

method.name: getEventFdPasserNamespace
method.tp:docstring: Retreive the namespace of a running instance of a file descriptor passer in the UNIX domain. This so-called file descriptor passer is only used for passing the fd corresponding to an eventfd() source. It would be possible with DBUS alone, but only starting from 1.3.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The shared memory segment. (frame capture).

arg.name: path
arg.tp:docstring: The namespace of a running instance of a file descriptor passer for the corresponding shm. Throws DBus::NoSuchShmException if the given shared memory segment can't be found.

method.name: getShmInfo
method.tp:docstring: Get the video format information for the frames that get written into the given shared memory segment.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The path to an existing shared memory segment

arg.name: path
arg.tp:docstring: A structure describing the shared memory segment. This one contains, in the following order : width, height, fourcc. Throws a NoSuchShmException if the given shm name cannot be found.

arg.name: callId
arg.tp:docstring: An identifier for the call in which this video stream is part of.

arg.name: shm
arg.tp:docstring: The path to the share memory region for accessing the remote video stream.

arg.name: callId
arg.tp:docstring: An identifier for the call in which this video stream is part of.

arg.name: shm
arg.tp:docstring: The path to the share memory region for accessing the remote video stream.
